definitions.text: a male with the same parents as someone else
examples: my brother still lives with our parents

definitions.text: a male person who is a fellow member (of a fraternity or religion or other group)
examples: none of his brothers would betray him

definitions.text: a close friend who accompanies his buddies in their activities
used as a term of address for those male persons engaged in the same movement
(Roman Catholic Church) a title given to a monk and used as form of address
